column5: Is the slot size on Minnitaki 18 t0 21 inches or is it 18 t0 22in?? Thanks walleye6

Walleye6: Take a look at page 14 on the following reference:http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/MNR/pubs/fi...p_E_fr2004.pdf The following is stated for Minnitaki Lake as well as other lakes: "Walleye and sauger must be less than 46 cm (18 in.) or greater than 53 cm (20.9 in.) and not more than one (1) greater than 53 cm (20.9 in.) in length." "No person shall possess any live fish taken by angling other than bait-fish."
[font color=green size=3][b]That should be "some" other lakes, not all of them. Read the regulations for the lake you fish to be sure.
Thanks for the info. Size really DOES matter. walleye6
